description:
Eve returns to Nafrece and learns more about her parents and her past.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Girl Who Regained Her Lost Memories Returns Home and Learns a New Truth
Ushinatta Kioku o Torimodoshita Shoujo wa, Kokyou ni Modotte Arata na Shinjitsu o Shiru
失った記憶を取り戻した少女は, 故郷に戻って新たな真実を知る
